docs.lead_paragraph: A landlord’s lawyer argued that a Hispanic child’s higher education chances were low, so the damages awarded to his family should be reduced.

headline.main: Award in Lead Paint Lawsuit Can’t Be Tied to Ethnicity, Judge Rules
headline.print_headline: Damages Can’t Be Tied to Ethnicity, Judge Rules

docs.abstract: Federal Judge Jack B Weinstein rules that ethnicity cannot be considered in determining damages awarded in lead poisoning case; landlord Mark Kimpson had attempted to have $2 million award reduced, saying victim is less likely to attend college or have high-paying job in future because he is Hispanic.
docs.snippet: A landlord’s lawyer argued that a Hispanic child’s higher education chances were low, so the damages awarded to his family should be reduced.

docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities have arrested a South Carolina woman they say hid her pregnancy and buried her newborn son in her backyard when he died.

headline.main: South Carolina Mom Charged With Burying Newborn in Yard
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Mom Charged With Burying Newborn in Yard

docs.snippet: Authorities have arrested a South Carolina woman they say hid her pregnancy and buried her newborn son in her backyard when he died.

docs.lead_paragraph: An Alabama prisoner who went to federal court seeking an abortion filed a court document Wednesday saying she'd changed her mind and wanted to give birth, after the state had sought to prevent her from undergoing the procedure.

headline.main: Alabama Prisoner, in Court Documents, Drops Bid for Abortion
headline.print_headline: Alabama Prisoner, in Court Documents, Drops Bid for Abortion

docs.snippet: An Alabama prisoner who went to federal court seeking an abortion filed a court document Wednesday saying she'd changed her mind and wanted to give birth, after the state had sought to prevent her from undergoing the procedure.

headline.main: Girls Are Born With Weaker Backbones Than Boys

docs.abstract: Girls tend to be born with smaller and weaker backbones than boys, a new study has found.
docs.snippet: Girls tend to be born with smaller and weaker backbones than boys, a new study has found.

docs.lead_paragraph: When Halima Rahim became a mother for the first time, friends and acquaintances in Tanzania's commercial capital, Dar Es Salaam, were quick to offer advice and help.

headline.main: Tanzania's Free SMS Health Campaign Helps Pregnant Women, New Mothers
